Key Arguments: The proposed legislation grants excessive power to the government over information access.
Free society should allow for diverse opinions and open debate, even if some find it offensive.
The government already uses mainstream media for propaganda, and this bill could exacerbate that issue.
Individuals should be trusted to discern truth from misinformation without government intervention.
Notable Quotes: What right has any Government to restrict the flow of free information when it is allowed to bully us with their ‘truth’.
We need to hang on to what vestige of freedom we have remaining before even our right to speak is removed and then we become a truly Orwellian society.
